name: react-resolver
description: Async-rendering & data-fetching for universal React applications

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:docs && npm run build:lib
scripts.clean: npm run clean:docs && npm run clean:lib
scripts.docs:publish: npm run clean:docs && npm run build:docs && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'Update gitbook' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'Update gitbook' && git push --force git@github.com:ericclemmons/react-resolver gh-pages
scripts.postversion: git push origin master --tags && npm run docs:publish

author: Eric Clemmons <eric@smarterspam.com>
